description:
The Underworld: Felicidad — A place apart from Heaven and the human realm. Overflowing with monsters of all shapes and sizes, it is home to human-like people known as denizens. In harmony with monsters, the denizens built a civilization of their own. Those among the denizens capable of training and controlling monsters are called "Farmagia." These monster tamers served as the pillars of denizen society. The world was peaceful under the rule of the Magus and his generals known as the Oración Seis. But the Magus has died...
Source: Game Official Website
